overview: It's about riding the board that best suits the conditions for you, going back to the basics, abandoning any preconceived or popularly accepted ways to ride waves, single fin or tri-fin longboards, modern retro and state-of-the-art shortboards, or bodysurfing.  We say, "Ride them all."  CJ Nelson, one of the most amazing and creative surfers ever, is joined by an all-star cast in this action-packed movie that you'll want to watch over and over again.
title: Another State of Mind
